name: Google Analytics Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Analytics Tool 节点。主要用于: Use the Google Analytics API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Use the Google Analytics API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: report

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: search
available_options: Search (值: search) - Return user activity data

propertyType.name: propertyType
propertyType.description: Google Analytics 4 is the latest version. Universal Analytics is an older version that is not fully functional after the end of June 2023.
propertyType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Type | 作用: Google Analytics 4 is the latest version. Universal Analytics is an older version that is not fully functional after the end of June 2023. | 默认值: ga4

propertyId.name: propertyId
propertyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property | 作用: The Property of Google Analytics | 提示: If this doesn't work, try changing the 'Property Type' field above | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

dateRange.name: dateRange
dateRange.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date Range | 默认值: last7days | (必填项)

metricsGA4.name: metricsGA4
metricsGA4.description: The quantitative measurements of a report. For example, the metric eventCount is the total number of events. Requests are allowed up to 10 metrics.
metricsGA4.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metrics | 作用: The quantitative measurements of a report. For example, the metric eventCount is the total number of events. Requests are allowed up to 10 metrics. | 默认值: {'metricValues': [{'listName': 'totalUsers'}]}

dimensionsGA4.name: dimensionsGA4
dimensionsGA4.description: Dimensions are attributes of your data. For example, the dimension city indicates the city from which an event originates. Dimension values in report responses are strings; for example, the city could be "Paris" or "New York". Requests are allowed up to 9 dimensions.
dimensionsGA4.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dimensions to split by | 作用: Dimensions are attributes of your data. For example, the dimension city indicates the city from which an event originates. Dimension values in report responses are strings; for example, the city could be "Paris" or "New York". Requests are allowed up to 9 dimensions. | 默认值: {'dimensionValues': [{'listName': 'date'}]}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: activityTypes (值: None) - Type of activites requested

viewId.name: viewId
viewId.description: The view from Google Analytics. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
viewId.natural_language_description: 参数名: View Name or ID | 作用: The view from Google Analytics. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 提示: If there's nothing here, try changing the 'Property type' field above | (必填项)

metricsUA.name: metricsUA
metricsUA.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metrics | 作用: Metrics in the request | 默认值: {'metricValues': [{'listName': 'ga:users'}]}

dimensionsUA.name: dimensionsUA
dimensionsUA.description: Dimensions are attributes of your data. For example, the dimension ga:city indicates the city, for example, "Paris" or "New York", from which a session originates.
dimensionsUA.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dimensions to split by | 作用: Dimensions are attributes of your data. For example, the dimension ga:city indicates the city, for example, "Paris" or "New York", from which a session originates. | 默认值: {'dimensionValues': [{'listName': 'ga:date'}]}

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: ID of a user | (必填项)
